## Learner Persona: Julie

- Background
  + Early career financial audit analyst. Does reporting on financial trends & basic rolling average projections
  + Tired of having to reformat excel sheets weekly for reports. Does lots of manual, non repeatable manipulation in excel
  
- Needs
  + To improve R skills data maniuplation skills in order to create enhanved projection & reports that take less time & are more reproducible
  + No more copy and paste!
  
- Relevant Experience
  + Uses excel and ACL (Audit Control Language)
  + Will occasionally use R at work to fit a regression model, but mostly does her data maniuplation in excel
  + To jump start her skills has taken R-Ladies Intro to R courses covering
    - R & RStudio Basics (R Objects, RStudio, Data types & Structures)
    - Data Wrangling basics (pipes & dplyr: filter, slice, select, mutate, etc.)
    - Visulation (ggplot2)

- Special Considerations
  + Has a heavy meeting schedule
  + Does best visual examples

## What is Tidy Data ?

- **observations** are the **rows**
- **variables** are the **columns**
- each **value** has its own **cell**

From _R for Data Science: Tidy Data Chapter_, by Hadley Wickham & Garrett Grolemund
